statements: SELECT * FROM activity_monitoring
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM activity_monitoring
SELECT id, ip_address FROM activity_monitoring WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT * FROM activity_monitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, ip_address FROM activity_monitoring WHERE activity_type = 'login'
SELECT * FROM activity_monitoring WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_type, timestamp FROM activity_monitoring WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM activity_monitoring GROUP BY user_id HAVING activity_count > 5;
SELECT id, activity_type FROM activity_monitoring WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY id;
SELECT DISTINCT ip_address FROM activity_monitoring WHERE activity_type IN ('login', 'logout') ORDER BY ip_address ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT activity_type, activity_description FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Login' AND activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_id, MAX(alert_timestamp) AS latest_alert_timestamp FROM activity_alert GROUP BY activity_id;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT activity_type, activity_time FROM activity_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%doe%';
SELECT * FROM activity_logs WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_time FROM activity_logs WHERE user_id = 10 OR user_id = 15;
SELECT log_id, user_id, activity_type FROM activity_logs WHERE activity_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM activity_logs GROUP BY activity_type ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.activity_type, a.activity_time FROM activity_logs a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY a.activity_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM activity_monitoring;
SELECT activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM activity_monitoring WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_timestamp, activity_type FROM activity_monitoring WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM activity_monitoring WHERE activity_type LIKE '%suspicious%' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(session_duration) AS average_session_duration FROM user_sessions;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp, activity_details FROM activity_monitoring ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE session_duration > 3600 ORDER BY session_start;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS num_activities FROM suspicious_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_activities > 5;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'security' AND alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT activity_type) AS num_unique_activities FROM activity_monitoring GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_unique_activities > 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_time FROM activities WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'security' AND alert_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email, last_login FROM users WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM activities;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM users JOIN activities ON users.user_id = activities.user_id JOIN alerts ON activities.activity_id = alerts.activity_id GROUP BY username;
SELECT * FROM blacklist WHERE blocked_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
